```{r setup}
library(extRemes)
library(extraDistr)
library(rstan)
rstan_options(auto_write = TRUE)
options(mc.cores = parallel::detectCores())
library(hbevr)
```

# Generate synthetic data from GEV with known parameters
```{r}
mu_true = 100
xi_true = 0.1
sigma_true = 5
ssize = 60
sample = extraDistr::rgev(ssize, mu = mu_true, sigma = sigma_true, xi = xi_true)
```

# Fit the GEV model
```{r}
# fit stan model
gevfit <- hbevr::fit_ev_model(sample, model='gev', onlymax_gev = TRUE)
```

# compute GEV quantiles
```{r}
# compute quantiles
gevq = hbevr::comp_quant(gevfit, sample)
```

# Plot the result
```{r}
plot(gevq$Trval, gevq$XivalQ)
lines(gevq$Trval, gevq$qmean,  col='red', lty = 'solid')
lines(gevq$Trval, gevq$qupper, col='red', lty = 'dashed')
lines(gevq$Trval, gevq$qlower, col='red', lty = 'dashed')

```
